Package com.CMPUT301F22T26.foodegy

Class Recipe

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.CMPUT301F22T26.foodegy.Recipe
  • public class Recipe
extends java.lang.Object
    The recipe class is used to hold the user input data of the recipe which the user adds on when using the Recipe view and edit feature of the app.
